overview: Liverpool hit the net over 100 times in 2005/06, and this DVD boasts every single goal from every single game in the Premiership, FA Cup, Champions League, World Club Championship and Carling Cup, with all the twists and turns on the road to Cardiff. It also features memorable wins against Manchester United and Chelsea, a classic third round tie at Luton, and a 7-0 thrashing of Birmingham City.  Liverpool are FA Cup winners again after one of the most dramatic FA Cup Finals of modern times. The Reds recreated the miracle of Istanbul. Steven Gerrard's sensational strike from 35 yards capped a dramatic comeback against West Ham. Pepe Reina became the hero in the penalty shoot-out. Re-live the drama of the Cup Final, with highlights from the Millenium Stadium, and the complete shoot-out.  Premiership progress was made too, with Liverpool claiming third place after a record breaking season at the back, while Robbie Fowler's return brought a smile to every Liverpudlian's face.
title: Liverpool FC: Season Review 2005-2006
